articles.title: WATCH LIVE: Trump holds campaign rally on Georgia Tech campus in Atlanta - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Donald Trump’s Atlanta rally this evening is being held at McCamish Pavilion, across the street from the CNN studios where Trump and President Joe Biden had their campaign-defining debate just four months ago.
